title.value: Yb-based high dose rate intensity modulated brachytherapy for focal treatment of prostate cancer
title.justification: The title reflects the main focus of the research, which explores the use of Yb-based high dose rate intensity modulated brachytherapy for treating prostate cancer.
title.quote: PURPOSE: This study compares conventional 192 Ir-based high dose rate brachytherapy (HDR-BT) with 169 Yb-based HDR intensity modulated brachytherapy (IMBT) for focal prostate cancer treatment.

extractions.description: This research paper discusses the comparison between conventional 192Ir-based and 169Yb-based high dose rate brachytherapy for prostate cancer treatment. It specifically focuses on the use of intensity modulated brachytherapy (IMBT) for focal treatments and explores the potential advantages in terms of reduced invasiveness and better dose distribution, resulting in fewer side effects on surrounding tissues like the urethra and rectum.

type.justification: The paper reports on a retrospective dosimetric study, comparing different treatment plans on actual patient data, making it empirical.
type.quote: METHODS AND MATERIALS: A retrospective dosimetric study of ten prostate cancer patients initially treated with conventional 192 Ir-based HDR-BT and 5-14 catheters was employed.

name.justification: The research is primarily focused on improving brachytherapy techniques, specifically using a Yb-based source for treating prostate cancer.
name.quote: High dose rate brachytherapy (HDR-BT) has emerged as an effective treatment modality for prostate cancer.

name.justification: The paper discusses dosimetric calculations, optimizations, and Monte Carlo simulations, which are key areas in medical physics.
name.quote: METHODS AND MATERIALS: A retrospective dosimetric study... RapidBrachyMCTPS, a Monte Carlo-based treatment planning system was used to calculate and optimize dose distributions.

name.justification: The study is for treating prostate cancer, making oncology, and more specifically radiation oncology, a relevant field.
name.quote: Prostate cancer is currently the second most commonly diagnosed cancer in men and ranks among the top five causes of mortality globally.

name.justification: RapidBrachyMCTPS is mentioned as a Monte Carlo-based treatment planning system used for dose calculations and optimizations in the paper.
name.quote: METHODS AND MATERIALS: RapidBrachyMCTPS, a Monte Carlo-based treatment planning system was used to calculate and optimize dose distributions.

is_contributed.justification: The model is utilized for calculations but is not claimed as a contribution by the authors of this paper.
is_contributed.quote: METHODS AND MATERIALS: RapidBrachyMCTPS, a Monte Carlo-based treatment planning system was used to calculate and optimize dose distributions.

is_executed.justification: The system is used for simulations and calculations, indicating it was executed during the study.
is_executed.quote: METHODS AND MATERIALS: RapidBrachyMCTPS, a Monte Carlo-based treatment planning system was used to calculate and optimize dose distributions.

is_compared.justification: RapidBrachyMCTPS is not compared to other models within the study; it is used as a tool for the simulations and calculations required for the research.
is_compared.quote: METHODS AND MATERIALS: RapidBrachyMCTPS, a Monte Carlo-based treatment planning system was used to calculate and optimize dose distributions.
